title: The Urge to Jump
description: Sappho Jones is on the slippery slope to the big four-oh Her friends are determined to show her that growing older doesn't necessarily mean bifocals and changing your library books twice a week. Sappho is beginning to realize that she's close to becoming an eccentric female and has the urge to do something dramatic before it's too late. The trouble is, the only thing she hasn't tried is motherhood. With sexy potter Nye on hand as a potential daddy - or at least a donor, is it time for her to consider the biggest jump of all? It's either that or buy a cat...
author: Trisha Ashley
